description:
Yoshino and Saori have started their new lives in middle school. Things continue to be awkward as they go through their day to day. They join the various teams at the start of the semester; Yoshino to basketball and Saori to volleyball.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dislike, Dislike, Hate: Cry Baby Cry
Kirai Kirai Daikirai: Cry Baby Cry
きらい きらい 大きらい ~Cry baby cry~
